comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: U.S. Atlantic Fleet Change of Command Ceremony On board Wyoming (BB-32) September 17, 1914, probably at the New York Navy Yard. Rear Admiral Charles J. Badger is at right, reading his orders as he turns command of the U.S. Atlantic Fleet over to Rear Admiral Frank Friday Fletcher (right center). Looking on, in left center, is Rear Admiral Bradley A. Fiske, aide for operations to Secretary Daniels of the Navy. — NavSource Naval History
